trans-unit.source: Represents a control that lets users attach typed text or handwritten annotations to documents.
trans-unit.target: 表示可讓使用者將輸入文字或手寫附註附加至文件的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A sticky note provides a rectangular area whose content is separate from the text, image, or other material to which the note is anchored.
trans-unit.target: 自黏便箋提供長方形區塊的內容會與文字、 影像或其他註解所錨定的資料分開。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl> class and its members are public so that it can be styled, but is no public constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>類別和其成員是公用的讓它可以套用樣式，但沒有公用建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Instances are created with the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.CreateTextStickyNoteCommand> and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.CreateInkStickyNoteCommand> of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> class.
When a sticky note is created, it is designated as one of two types:
trans-unit.target: 建立自黏便箋時，會將它指定為下列其中一種：

trans-unit.source: **Text** sticky notes have a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox> content area that can be written and edited like any other Rich Text area.
trans-unit.target: **文字**自黏便箋有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.RichTextBox>內容可以撰寫和編輯像任何其他的 Rtf 文字區域的區域。

trans-unit.source: Users can type into it and can also cut, copy, and paste both within the note and between the note and other applications.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以輸入，也可以剪下、 複製和貼上內附註和附註和其他應用程式之間。

trans-unit.source: Images can also be pasted into the note.
The usual Rich Text keyboard shortcuts are also available.
trans-unit.target: 一般的 Rich Text 鍵盤快速鍵也會提供。

trans-unit.source: **Ink** sticky notes have an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas> content area and it can be edited like other ink canvasses.
trans-unit.target: **筆跡**自黏便箋有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvas>內容區域和它可以編輯其他筆墨 canvasses 一樣。

trans-unit.source: For example, strokes can be erased.
With a tablet PC or other suitable hardware, users can enter handwritten notes.
trans-unit.target: Tablet PC 或其他適當的硬體，使用者可輸入手寫的便箋。

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl> makes it a more powerful way to annotate material than marking up a hardcopy or using physical handwritten notes.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>使得更強大的方式，來加上註解材料比硬拷貝標記，或使用實體的手寫的便箋。

trans-unit.source: It is also more flexible than simply adding to, or striking through, the text of a document.
trans-unit.target: 它也是比直接加入，或透過文件的文字可以突顯出更有彈性。

trans-unit.source: Sticky notes can be resized.
trans-unit.target: 自黏便箋可以調整大小。

trans-unit.source: Sticky notes can be minimized to an icon and expanded.
trans-unit.target: 自黏便箋可以最小化成一個圖示和展開。

trans-unit.source: When maximized, a sticky note can be dragged to a new position in a window without changing the location of its anchor.
trans-unit.target: 最大化時，可以拖曳自黏便箋到視窗中的新位置而不需要變更其錨點的位置。

trans-unit.source: The exact content to which a sticky note applies is highlighted and marked off with brackets.
trans-unit.target: 要套用的自黏便箋的確切內容會反白顯示，並以方括號標記。

trans-unit.source: Two or more sticky notes can apply to the same content or to overlapping content.
trans-unit.target: 兩個或多個 「 自黏便箋可以套用至相同的內容或重疊的內容。

trans-unit.source: When change occurs within the document content to which a sticky note is anchored, the sticky note's position moves in position relative to the content to which it was bound.
trans-unit.target: 當自黏便箋所錨定的文件內容中發生變更時，自黏便箋的位置將移至已繫結的內容的相對位置。

trans-unit.source: With text sticky notes, lines will wrap automatically.
trans-unit.target: 使用文字自黏便箋，會自動換行。

trans-unit.source: If the note is resized, lines will re-wrap as needed.
trans-unit.target: 如果便箋調整大小，視需要重新將換行。

trans-unit.source: If content extends below the bottom of the note, a vertical scroll bar will appear.
trans-unit.target: 如果內容延伸下方的附註，則會出現垂直捲軸。

trans-unit.source: With ink sticky notes, vertical and horizontal scroll bars will appear whenever content extends beyond the boundaries of the note.
trans-unit.target: 筆跡自黏便箋，與內容超出便箋的界限時，會出現垂直和水平捲軸。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how menu commands in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> can be configured to execute the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.CreateTextStickyNoteCommand> and <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.CreateInkStickyNoteCommand> of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示功能表中的命令<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>可以設定為執行<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.CreateTextStickyNoteCommand>和<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.CreateInkStickyNoteCommand>的<xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>類別。

trans-unit.source: The example shows how to read an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)] document into a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer> control and then enable support for adding user-created sticky notes.
trans-unit.target: 此範例示範如何讀取[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_metro](~/includes/tlasharptla-metro-md.md)]文件到<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer>控制，然後啟用 加入使用者建立自黏便箋的支援。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that provides information about the annotated object.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件，這個物件提供已標註之物件的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo" /> object that provides information about the annotated object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.IAnchorInfo" /> 物件，提供已標註之物件的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to match the sticky note with the corresponding annotated object.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性可讓您以符合對應的註解物件自黏便箋。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.AnchorInfo%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the author who created the sticky note.
trans-unit.target: 取得建立自黏便箋的作者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the author who created the sticky note.
trans-unit.target: 建立自黏便箋之作者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.Author" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the font family of the caption for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" /> 標題的字型系列。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.FontFamily" /> for the control's caption.
The default is the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily" />.
We recommend that you do not attempt to get a reference to an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl> nor, hence, that you read or write this property directly.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議您不要來取得執行個體的參考<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>也因此，讀取或直接寫入這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property should be used only in styling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>s.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.CaptionFontFamily" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the size of the font used for the caption of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" /> 標題的字型大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> representing the font size.
The default is the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize" />.
We recommend that you do not attempt to get a reference to an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl> nor, hence, that you read or write this property directly.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議您不要來取得執行個體的參考<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>也因此，讀取或直接寫入這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property should be used only in styling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>s.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.CaptionFontSize" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the degree to which the font used for the caption of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" /> is stretched.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" /> 標題之字型的縮放程度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> structure representing the degree of stretching compared to a font's normal aspect ratio.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> 結構，代表相對於字型一般外觀比例的縮放度數。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="P:System.Windows.FontStretches.Normal" />.
We recommend that you do not attempt to get a reference to an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl> nor, hence, that you read or write this property directly.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議您不要來取得執行個體的參考<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>也因此，讀取或直接寫入這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property should be used only in styling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>s.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.CaptionFontStretch" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the style of the font used for the caption of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" /> 標題的字型樣式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStyle" /> structure representing the style of the caption as normal, italic, or oblique.
trans-unit.target: 代表標題樣式為正常、斜體或傾斜的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStyle" /> 結構。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontStyle" />.
We recommend that you do not attempt to get a reference to an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl> nor, hence, that you read or write this property directly.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議您不要來取得執行個體的參考<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>也因此，讀取或直接寫入這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property should be used only in styling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>s.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.CaptionFontStyle" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the weight of the font used for the caption of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定用於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" /> 標題的字型粗細。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> structure representing the weight of the font, for example, bold, ultrabold, or extralight.
trans-unit.target: 表示字型粗細的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontWeight" /> 結構，例如粗體、特粗或特細。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontWeight" />.
We recommend that you do not attempt to get a reference to an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl> nor, hence, that you read or write this property directly.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議您不要來取得執行個體的參考<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>也因此，讀取或直接寫入這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property should be used only in styling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>s.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.CaptionFontWeight" /> dependency property.

Represents a command whose <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute(System.Object,System.Windows.IInputElement)" /> method deletes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 代表其 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute(System.Object,System.Windows.IInputElement)" /> 方法會刪除 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" /> 的命令。

trans-unit.source: Represents a command whose <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute(System.Object,System.Windows.IInputElement)" /> method will switch the cursor in an ink sticky note to one of several possible modes, including draw and erase.
trans-unit.target: 表示擁有 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute(System.Object,System.Windows.IInputElement)" /> 方法的命令，該方法會將筆跡自黏便箋中的游標切換成數種可能模式之一，包括繪製和清除。

trans-unit.source: When used, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.InkCommand> takes a parameter of type <xref:System.Windows.Controls.InkCanvasEditingMode>.
The command's <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A> method will put the cursor in the mode specified by the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 此命令<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand.Execute%2A>方法會將游標放在參數所指定的模式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the Xml type of the ink sticky note annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得筆跡自黏便箋附註的 XML 類型。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" /> is active.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" /> 是否正在使用中。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is active; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項正在使用中，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
We recommend that you do not attempt to get a reference to an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl> nor, hence, that you read this property directly.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議您不要來取得執行個體的參考<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>也因此，直接讀取這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.IsActive" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.IsActive%2A> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" /> is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，表示是否已展開 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the control is expanded; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制項已展開，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
We recommend that you do not attempt to get a reference to an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl> nor, hence, that you read or write this property directly.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議您不要來取得執行個體的參考<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>也因此，讀取或直接寫入這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.IsExpanded" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.IsExpanded%2A> dependency property.
Gets a value indicating whether the mouse cursor is over the anchor of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，表示滑鼠游標是否位於 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" /> 的錨定之上。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the mouse cursor is over the anchor; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果滑鼠游標位於錨定之上，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
We recommend that you do not attempt to get a reference to an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl> nor, hence, that you read this property directly.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議您不要來取得執行個體的參考<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>也因此，直接讀取這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.IsMouseOverAnchor" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.IsMouseOverAnchor%2A> dependency property.
Registers event handlers for all the children of a template.
trans-unit.target: 為範本的所有子項註冊事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.OnApplyTemplate%2A> is performed automatically after the control applies an ink or text sticky note template to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.OnApplyTemplate%2A> 會自動執行控制項套用至控制項的墨水或文字自黏便箋範本後。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the pen for an ink <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定筆跡 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl" /> 的畫筆寬度。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Double" /> representing the width of the pen.
The default is the value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Ink.DrawingAttributes.Width" />.
We recommend that you do not attempt to get a reference to an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl> nor, hence, that you read or write this property directly.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議您不要來取得執行個體的參考<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>也因此，讀取或直接寫入這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property should be used only in styling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>s.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata.AffectsMeasure%2A>,
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.PenWidth" /> dependency property.
Gets a value that indicates whether the sticky note is text or ink.
trans-unit.target: 取得表示自黏便箋為文字或筆跡的值。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteType" /> value indicating the type of note.
The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteType.Text" />.
An ink <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl> can be used for handwritten notes on a tablet PC or other hardware that supports handwritten input.
trans-unit.target: 筆跡<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>可用於 tablet PC 或其他支援硬體的手寫的輸入上的手寫便箋。

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you do not attempt to get a reference to an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl> nor, hence, that you read this property directly.
trans-unit.target: 我們建議您不要來取得執行個體的參考<xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>也因此，直接讀取這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: This property should be used only in styling <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl>s.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.StickyNoteType" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StickyNoteControl.StickyNoteType%2A> dependency property.
Gets the Xml type of the text sticky note annotation.
trans-unit.target: 取得文字自黏便箋附註的 XML 類型。
